RSG|"Research Data Analyst
Department: Market Research  Location: White River Junction
RSG is seeking a Research Data Analyst. This position is based in our White River Junction
AS A RESEARCH DATA ANALYST

You are part of a team that applies smartphone-based GPS survey research and analytics with the goal of better understanding behavioral change due to transportation innovation and technology. Your team conducts market research in sectors such as public and private transportation
column5: transportation network companies (TNC)
column6: and mobility service providers (MSP). You work on all phases of the market research process including designing and implementing research approaches and survey questionnaires; administering surveys and monitoring data; performing data preparation and database management; conducting analysis; and writing reports and presentations based on findings. You are interested in working on survey datasets in conjunction with different types of datasets such as massive passively-collected location data
column8: and publicly available demographic or geospatial data.
